identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Quant's Cockpit' - a high-density, professional trading interface that feels like a futuristic terminal, not a generic SaaS dashboard.

core_principles: Density is Information: Use tight spacing for data, generous spacing for hierarchy.
Neon on Void: Pure black backgrounds with sharp neon accents for signals.
The AI is Alive: Visualize the reasoning process, don't just show the result.
Swiss Precision: Typography must be objective and legible.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Stock Symbols

data.usage: Prices, Percentages, Technical Indicators, Code Snippets

usage_rules: Never use pure white text on black; use #EDEDED.
Use 'dim' colors for backgrounds of badges/chips (e.g., bg-success_dim text-success).
Gradients are forbidden for backgrounds, allowed only for 'glow' effects on active elements.

stock_detail.structure: Sidebar (Search/History) | Main Content (Chart + Analysis) | Right Panel (Order Book/Signals)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md font-medium px-4 py-2 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#1F1F1F] text-text_primary hover:bg-[#1F1F1F] rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-[#121212] border border-[#1F1F1F] focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md text-text_primary placeholder:text-text_secondary

charts.theme: Dark mode optimized. Grid lines: #1F1F1F. Tooltip: bg-[#0A0A0A] border-[#1F1F1F].

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or floating overlays. backdrop-blur-md bg-black/70 border-b border-white/5.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the main background to reduce digital flatness.

effects: Typewriter effect for AI reasoning logs.

image_urls.description: Abstract blue swirls, use for Login/Landing page background with overlay.
Abstract squares, use as a subtle pattern in the 'AI Analysis' card background.
Statue of a bull, use for 'Market Sentiment' section or empty states.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/chivo', '@fontsource/manrope', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined in the 'colors' section. Extend the font family theme.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Modify /src/index.css to replace the default zinc colors with the 'Void Black' palette.
4. BUILD LAYOUTS: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard. Do not use standard columns.
5. AI VISUALIZATION: When displaying AI reasoning, use a 'Terminal/Log' style component with a monospaced font and a typing animation.
6. CHARTS: Ensure all charts use the custom neon colors (Success/Danger) for candles/lines.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, chart toggles).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
